name: Candy Kill (0.1a)
description:
*

* VERSION          0.1a             IS THE UPDATED VERSION ! *

This is the alpha version of candy kill, a world where potatoes live happily, but the candies come to take over the place!

A brave potato is sent to spy on the candies, but is captured and thrown into a Dungeon !

FIND UR WAY OUT !

RANDOMLY GENERATED DUNGEONS!!

GET A NEW DUNGEON EVER TIME U PLAY !!!!!

KNUCKLES HIDDEN  !!

*click* *click*

controls

movement - WSAD

jump - SPACE

sprint - SHIFT

reload - R

switch to melee - Q

aim - RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON

fire - LEFT MOUSE BUTTON

Thnx for playing :D
